# Interactive component

```{r}
library(dplyr)
interactive <- read.csv("data/interactive.csv")
interactive <- interactive[2: 38]
output <- interactive %>% pivot_longer(!State, names_to = "Month", values_to = "Unemployment_Rate")
output <- output[, c(2, 1, 3)]

output <- output %>% filter("State" != "Puerto Rico")
output
```
